document_data.name: Eilistraee's Grace
document_data.mainbody: '''''Eilistraee's grace''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] used by [[Silverhair Knights]].
document_data.Effects:
When cast, the caster summoned the might and grace of Eilistraee, enveloping themselves in a divine radiance. This radiant energy manifested as a silvery glow that encompassed the caster's body, casting light over a {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} radius and significantly hindered the caster's ability to remain concealed.

While the spell was in effect, the caster's agility and mobility was temporarily increased. In addition, the divine energy imbued the caster's touch attacks and any melee weapons they employed, aligning them with the forces of good. This allowed the weapons to bypass damage reduction as if they were good-aligned.
document_data.Components: This spell only required a [[verbal component]].
